PageTitle: display bgp sr-policy ipv6 peer log-info
FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy ipv6 peer log-info command displays detailed connection and disconnection records of the specified peer.
CLIs: display bgp sr-policy ipv6 peer <ipv6-address> log-info

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the address of the IPv6 peer to be displayed.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp sr-policy ipv6 peer 1::2 log-info
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp peer log-info verbose command displays the detailed connection and disconnection records of the specified peer for helping analyze the connection exceptions of BGP neighbors.
